version_description:
Bug fixes and improvements.

If you like our app, rate it above and leave us a comment. It helps. Honestly.
New widgets on Dashboard: Budget 50/20/30 and Expense limit for a period.

New design of transaction feed in History. You can change color of icons and upload your photos in category settings.

Try it! And let us know what you think.

Now you can export transactions in CSV format (menu / Settings / Export transactions).
Fixed bug when app crashed after transactions import from bank.
Исправлена ошибка с обновлением Истории после импорта операций из банка
New widget - Savings.

Set yourself a limit on the week, month or till payday with widget "Limit for a period". Daily limit is calculated cumulatively. If the limit is gone below the zero, it means that you spend more quickly than necessary. The limit can be set for total spending or only for flexible.
Fixed some issues in transaction import from banks.
In reports you can group expenses by category and now by point of payment. Report can be built now for any period (not only for a week or a month).
Fixed what needed to be fixed, including sign in with Google.

— New "Budget" section
— New Calendar design on Dashboard
— Split transaction amount into several subcategories of one category.

If you like our app, rate it and leave us a comment. It helps us to support and develop the app.

- Totals and transfers to off-balance accounts were added in the Budget.
- Archived accounts can be "hidden" in the account list.

- Totals and transfers to off-balance accounts were added in the Budget.
- Archived accounts can be "hidden" in the account list.

+ New design of "Accounts" section. Banks with connected import are displayed separately. Tap on account to see transactions.
+ You can enable "autoimport" in import settings. Works for those banks that do not require an access code to log on.

+ If you want to show the structure of spendings for a project, trip or just for a month, save reports as pictures and send them to friends or partners. If you like this feature, write us in the chat. Tell us how we can make pictures more useful.
+ Fixed a bug with visibility of personal accounts, the app is optimized for the iPhone X and other minor changes.
Added hold-transactions processing in import from bank.

+ Scan QR-code and add receipt to a transaction
+ New stats on accounts and currencies
Planning a budget? Now this doesn't have to be from scratch. Copy last month's budget or outflows.

v2.9.1:
+ Do you want to open transaction form immediately after pressing the button (+), as before? Configure it in the Settings.
+ New icons for water, alcohol, snacks, fast food, repairs, taxes.

v2.9.0:
+ Scan QR-code and add receipt to a transaction
+ New stats on accounts and currencies

v3.0
+ Split receipt into several categories. To split the receipt, click the "Show receipt" in the ransaction form, and start selecting items.
+ Transactions with receipts are highlighted in History with a receipt icon.

v2.9:
+ Scan QR-code and add receipt to a transaction
+ New stats on accounts and currencies
Planning a budget? Now this doesn't have to be from scratch. Copy last month's budget or outflows.
Add transactions directly from PIN-code screen. Swipe right to add transaction, swipe left to scan  qr-code.

Upd 3.2.1: Support of syncronization with VTB Bank.

Add transactions directly from PIN-code screen. Swipe right to add transaction, swipe left to scan qr-code.
Know when connection with your bank are ready to go: check out recommendations on the Accounts page.
Know when connection with your bank are ready to go: check out recommendations on the Accounts page.

Control your spendings effortlessly.
* Connect the bank sync and receive notifications about transactions within 20 minutes after payment.
* In notifications, in addition to transaction information, will be the amount of category expenses and comparison with the average expenses for the same period.

Setup "regular" synchronization with the bank and receive notifications right after the transaction. In the notification, in addition to transaction information, there will be an amount of expence by category and a comparison with average expence for the same period.

Hide the overall balance with a swipe left.

Setup "regular" synchronization with the bank and receive notifications right after the transaction. In the notification, in addition to transaction information, there will be an amount of expence by category and a comparison with average expence for the same period.
Ещё один вариант запуска синхронизации: Каждый день в 21:00.
We updated the app so that you can connect and synchronize with Rosbank and Raiffeisen Bank Aval.
We are working hard on the quality of synchronization from banks.
We are working hard on the quality of synchronization from banks.
The problem of unavailability of encrypted storage has been resolved when, in order to continue synchronization with banks, the application had to be unloaded from memory.
Synchronization with monobank.
New look and feel for bank connection settings.
Fixed several bugs in bank integrations.
Added new bank Kaspi.kz
Numeric keypad added to enter transaction amount.
Bottom navigation, search and white theme.

- Invite partners to your account. Just enter email and we will do the rest.
- If you need to delete your data and start all over again, now you can do it in the Account Settings.

+ New account screen
+ Synchronization of investment accounts. The balance of such accounts is updated without corrections.
+ Regular synchronization every 20 minutes now starts only from 8:00 to 23:00 and does not start at night. This will get rid of unnecessary adjustments that were created because of night updates in banks.
+ QR codes scanning from receipts in Kazakhstan.

+ Add transaction on the account screen.
+ Change the type of account from a loan or deposit to any other.
"OK-TO-SPEND" is a new report that will change your view on planning.
"OK-TO-SPEND" is a new report that will change your view on planning.
"OK-TO-SPEND" is a new report that will change your view on planning.
"OK-TO-SPEND" is a new report that will change your view on planning.

Customize the display of the total balance. To do so, tap on the balance amount at the top.

If you have any feedback, come join us at Telegram-chat: https://t.me/zenmoneychat_en
